entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
